com.google.gwt.inject.rebind
Class MethodCollector

java.lang.Object
  com.google.gwt.inject.rebind.util.MemberCollector

public class MethodCollector
extends java.lang.Object

This class can be used to collect a type's methods, including those of its (recursive) superclasses and interfaces. The collector treats overrides correctly, i.e. it returns the method defined the closest to the provided type.

Note: The collector uses internal caching and can be called with the same arguments repeatedly without repeated performance costs.

This class is not thread-safe.

Nested Class Summary
static interface MethodCollector.Filter
          Filter used during the collection of methods to restrict the kind of collected methods.

Method Detail

setFilter

public void setFilter(MethodCollector.Filter filter)
Sets this collectors filter. This method can only be called once and must be called before any methods are requested.

Parameters:
filter - this collectors filter
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the filter is set a second time

getMethods

public java.util.Collection<com.google.gwt.core.ext.typeinfo.JMethod> getMethods(com.google.gwt.core.ext.typeinfo.JClassType type)
Returns all methods in the provided type, including those of the type's (recursive) super classes and interfaces. Treats overloads correctly. If no filter is set uses a default filter that allows all methods.

Parameters:
type - type for which methods are collected
Returns:
all methods for the given type
